import{getApi}from"../../api";import*as Types from"../type/index";/* ================== GET NAME USER ================== */export var getUser=function getUser(){return function(dispatch){getApi("auth/profile").then(function(result){//localStorage.setItem('profile', JSON.stringify(result.data));
return dispatch({type:Types.GETUSER,payload:result.data});});};};/* ================== GET NAME USER ================== */ /* ================== GET LIST STATUS ================== */export var getStatus=function getStatus(){return function(dispatch){getApi("status").then(function(result){return dispatch({type:Types.STATUS,payload:result.data});});};};/* ================== GET LIST STATUS ================== */ /* ================== GET ITEM ================== */export var getItem=function getItem(){return function(dispatch){getApi("item").then(function(result){return dispatch({type:Types.GET_ITEM,payload:result.data});});};};/* ================== GET ITEM ================== */ /* ================== ORDER ================== */export var addOrder=function addOrder(products){return function(dispatch){return dispatch({type:Types.ADD_ORDER,payload:products});};};export var deleteOrder=function deleteOrder(itemCode,variant){return function(dispatch){return dispatch({type:Types.DELETE_ORDER,payload:itemCode+variant});};};export var getCartByUser=function getCartByUser(){return function(dispatch){getApi("cart/getbyuser").then(function(result){return dispatch({type:Types.GET_CART_BY_USER,payload:result.data});});};};export var addOrderPurchasing=function addOrderPurchasing(){return function(dispatch){getApi("cart/getbyuser").then(function(result){return dispatch({type:Types.GET_CART_BY_USER,payload:result.data});});};};/* ================== ORDER ================== */
